text: Killing Joke are an industrial rock band from England. They have been called a key influence on the industrial rock genre. == Studio albums == * Killing Joke (1980) * What's THIS For...! (1981) * Revelations (1982) * Fire Dances (1983) * Night Time (1985) * Brighter than a Thousand Suns (1986) * Outside the Gate (1988) * Extremities, Dirt and Various Repressed Emotions (1990) * Pandemonium (1994) * Democracy (1996) * Killing Joke (2003) * Hosannas from the Basements of Hell (2006) * Absolute Dissent (2010) * MMXII (2012) * Pylon (2015) ==References== category:English rock bands Category:English punk bands Category:English heavy metal bands
title: Killing Joke
